name: Bitten!
description:
Bring your friends and try it together!

'Bitten' is a multiplayer game where you and your mates defend the Shelter from zombies in a post-apocalypse world. 

But be careful, some of you may turn out to be TRAITORS! They've been bitten by a zombie and trying to kill everybody else. 

Use power-ups, logic, tricks, and voice chat to disclose traitors or trick and kill others if you are the traitor.

AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bitten/id1556407553
GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=by.bitten.game
Website: https://bitten.by
Discord: https://discord.gg/rX4t4hpvuz
